column1: debbie ""deb"" graham| debbie ""deb"" graham. born: june 03
column3: 2015 debbie deb graham was born on june 3
column5: wyoming the daughter of calvin dewey and marlene pritchett and passed away on june 13
column6: 2015 at fredericktown at the age of 60 years. she was preceded in death by her parents
column8: and one brother chuck dewey. she is survived by her husband danny graham whom she was united in marriage to on october 20
column10: one son jeremy graham (fianc jessica sproull) of houston
column12: one daughter jennifer (travis) goodman of fredericktown
column13: one brother michael (jane) dewey of fredericktown
column14: one sister pam (leroy) sutton of jewett
column15: and three grandchildren marshall and brooklyn graham and trey goodman. deb enjoyed riding motorcycles
column18: and spending time with her grandkids and nieces and nephews. visitation; 5:00 p. m. monday
column20: 2015 at the follis & sons funeral home funeral service; 1:00 p. m. tuesday
